Help-I am stuck in Tochika!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Help-I am stuck in Tochika!
By Moon163beam on Monday, May 8, 2006 - 06:35 am:

I have gone through the caves in the adventure mode about 100 times, and every time that I get almost to the exit Nayuta says, "Not this way..." and it will not let me get to the end! Am I missing something? I have gone around and talked to everyone in the village over and over again thinking that maybe if I talk to the right person at the right time it will unlock?! If anyone got past this point please help me out!

By kilak on Monday, May 8, 2006 - 11:14 am:

there are several fights that have to be done to exit the caves (during the story line). make sure yo uare thorough in the actual aventure and kill all the mini boss fights that are there, that should get yo uout of there.
